document_data.name: Mharartel
document_data.georefs: {{Cite web/Ed Greenwood's Patreon/More than Manshoon's Lover (What Is a Shadowsil?)}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Mharartel''' was a barony in [[Chessenta]] during the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].

Geography.Geographical Features: During the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]], Mharartel was lightly forested rural lands, with woodlots, and pastures. There was at least one altar to [[Lathander]]. As of the turn of the 16{{th}} century, the land had turned into a part of [[Sebakar (nation)|Sebakar]] in the [[Vast Swamp]], south of the [[River Adder]].

document_data.Government: As a barony, there was presumably a baron in charge.
document_data.Trade: [[Tarnsaera]] brandy was made in the barony, and there was [[horse]] breeding.
document_data.History: By the turn of the 16{{th}} century [[DR]], Mharartel was long-vanished.
